EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-03-15 Cloud Migration eBook Send 1.ES-2019-03-15 Cloud Migration eBook E
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Plan and Execute a Smooth Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We just published a new eBook titled, How to Plan and Execute a Smooth Cloud Migration <[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-migration-whitepaper/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRnZAAU]]>.
The goal of the eBook is to help organizations like yours develop a cloud migration plan that will not only assure performance but also optimize and ensure policy compliance.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-migration-whitepaper/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRnZAAU]]>
I hope you and your team take the time to read about these industry-leading best practices which ultimately lay the foundation for a smooth migration to the cloud.
Download your free copy today <[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-migration-whitepaper/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRnZAAU]]>!
Regards, Andrew
